name: Brain Games: Words & Numbers for Brain Training
name_original: Brain Games: Words & Numbers for Brain Training
description:
-- Brain Games : Words & Numbers --

Train your brain by solving words & numbers puzzles!

2 game modes:

-- Words --

Swipe over the letter tiles to spell words.
For every 20 words found you earn 1 NeuroStar.
Find 100 words to complete the game and earn 5 NeuroStars + 1 NeuroStar Bonus!

-- Numbers --

Swipe over the number tiles to add them and match the target.
For every 20 targets solved you earn 1 NeuroStar.
Solve 100 targets to complete the game and earn 5 NeuroStars + 1 NeuroStar Bonus!

Need help? Use clues!
Earn NeuroStars to unlock more clues.

Features:

+ Dictionary : once you find a word you can check its definition.
Check the definitions for all the valid words at the end of each game.
+ Universal app
+ GameCenter: compete on 6 leaderboards and try to earn 8 achievements
+ iCloud Sync: sync your game progress across multiple devices

Are you left-handed? Playing on iPad? You can flip the game screen for a better experience!
